languages.text: "Ушли! Троном клянусь, мы найдем этих богомерзких тварей и отплатим им за все, что произошло в этом месте!"
"They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
languages.original_text: "Ушли! Троном клянусь, мы найдем этих богомерзких тварей и отплатим им за все, что произошло в этом месте!"

traits.locale_text: "They're gone! Throne be my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
"They're gone! Throne be my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
"They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
"They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
"They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"
"They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

languages.text: 「奴らが消えた！王座が目撃者だ。あの罰当たりな不届者達を見つけ出して、ここで起きた事件の償いをさせてやる！」
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴らが消えた！王座が目撃者だ。あの罰当たりな不届者達を見つけ出して、ここで起きた事件の償いをさせてやる！」

languages.text: “他们都逃跑了！愿黄金王座为我作证，我们一定会找到那些亵渎神明的恶棍，让他们为这里的一切付出代价！”
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: “他们都逃跑了！愿黄金王座为我作证，我们一定会找到那些亵渎神明的恶棍，让他们为这里的一切付出代价！”

languages.text: « Ils sont partis ! Que le Trône m'en soit témoin, nous allons débusquer ces blasphémateurs et les faire payer pour tout ce qu'il s'est produit ici ! »
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont partis ! Que le Trône m'en soit témoin, nous allons débusquer ces blasphémateurs et les faire payer pour tout ce qu'il s'est produit ici ! »

languages.text: «¡Han escapado! ¡Al Trono pongo por testigo de que encontraremos a esos espantajos blasfemos y les haremos pagar por todo lo sucedido!».
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Han escapado! ¡Al Trono pongo por testigo de que encontraremos a esos espantajos blasfemos y les haremos pagar por todo lo sucedido!».

languages.text: "Sie sind fort! So wahr der Thron mir helfe, wir werden diesen blasphemischen Abschaum finden und für alles bezahlen lassen, was hier geschehen ist!"
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind fort! So wahr der Thron mir helfe, wir werden diesen blasphemischen Abschaum finden und für alles bezahlen lassen, was hier geschehen ist!"

languages.text: "Gittiler! Taht şahidim olsun ki bu kâfir pislikleri bulacağız ve burada olan biten her şeyin hesabını onlardan soracağız!"
languages.original_text: "They're gone! Throne as my witness, we will find these blasphemous wretches and make them pay for everything that happened here!"

traits.locale_text: "Gittiler! Taht şahidim olsun ki bu kâfir pislikleri bulacağız ve burada olan biten her şeyin hesabını onlardan soracağız!"
